channel.title: Client Making
channel.description: Well, i'm making a server. Using Oceanx Source. I know how to edit client.java autospawn.cfg PLayerHander e.t.c.... But The client. The oceanX client, i have it right now. But the background on the Client Says Oceanx, and there's this guy dclaws specing. How can I change that? Like to change it to Legitpking or something. The wallpaper. Help please.

item.title: Client Making
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

boom wtf? nice way to get your post count up huh ?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Making
item.dc:creator: @_BOOM .:BOOM:.
item.description:
@_BOOM wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:2, topic:361551”]go to client30_sub2_sub1_sub1.java

and search for

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage

and your should find something similar to this

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./title.png");

Only if you can’t find the client background in the folders ATALL
But if you do you just gotta replace it with your pic but RENAME your pic to w.e the original bg pic is !!!
so replace the

title.png

with your picture name

BUT IT HAS TO BE .png
AND IT HAS TO BE IN YOUR CLIENT’s FOLDER[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Client Making
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

go to client30_sub2_sub1_sub1.java

and search for

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage

and your should find something similar to this

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./title.png");

so replace the

title.png

with your picture name

BUT IT HAS TO BE .png
AND IT HAS TO BE IN YOUR CLIENT’s FOLDER

Read full topic

item.title: Client Making
item.dc:creator: @i_k0 i k0
item.description:
@i_k0 wrote:

Well, i’m making a server. Using Oceanx Source. I know how to edit client.java autospawn.cfg PLayerHander e.t.c… But The client. The oceanX client, i have it right now. But the background on the Client Says Oceanx, and there’s this guy dclaws specing. How can I change that? Like to change it to Legitpking or something. The wallpaper. Help please.
